name: Lost Relic
description:
Matthew Fong - Game Designer

Weixiang Gao (Wallace) - Game Designer

Minjang Jin(Jimmy) - Game Programmer

Lost Relic is a third-person perspective puzzle game where the player solves puzzles in the dungeon. There are two levels, and the player should find out where the treasure is.

How to play

WASD - Movement, Left-Shift - Crouch, Space - Jump

Q - Return to the waypoint

Pressing the mouse right button can spin the camera to look up both left and right.

The mouse scroll wheel allows the player to move the camera up and down.

Pressing the mouse Left button on the purple box can tie a rope to move the player straightforward.

Click mouse right button on the yellow box allows the player pulls the box. This is the basic objective in Lost Relic. If you click one more time, it will be canceled.

Thank you for reading, and hopefully, you guys like it!
